001package net.tvburger.jdl.knn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.StraightLineWithNoise;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances.Metrics;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
007
008import java.util.Arrays;
009
010public class KnnMain {
011
012    public static void main(String[] args) {
013        NearestNeighbors nearestNeighbors = new NearestNeighbors(1, Metrics.euclidean(), new UniformWeighting());
014
015        DataSet dataSet = new StraightLineWithNoise().load();
016        DataSet trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
017        DataSet validationSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
018        NearestNeighborsPreparer regime = new NearestNeighborsPreparer();
019        Trainer<NearestNeighbors> nearestNeighborsTrainer = Trainer.of(null, null, null, regime);
020        nearestNeighborsTrainer.train(nearestNeighbors, trainingSet);
021
022        for (DataSet.Sample sample : validationSet) {
023            float[] estimate = nearestNeighbors.estimate(sample.features());
024            System.out.println("real = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate));
025        }
026    }
027}
